creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Virginia Dofflemyer
markings: on underside, on two stickers: [Old Japanese Heita / Blue & White Plate / 14-1/4 Diameter 2nd / Half 17th Century] and [This Pattern Is Very / Similar To The VOC / Dutch Export Ware / (See 200 Years of Jap Porc]
medium: Porcelain with cobalt blue underglaze decoration on white slip
title: Charger
